newsitem.title: USA: Adtran oks buyback, sees Q1 EPS near $0.24.
newsitem.headline: Adtran oks buyback, sees Q1 EPS near $0.24.

text.p: Adtran Inc said Tuesday that it expects net income for the first quarter ended March 31 to range from $0.23 to $0.24 on revenues of about $61 million.
Wall Street had been expecting the company to report first quarter earnings of $0.27 per share, according to First Call consensus estimates.

Additionally, the company said its board had authorized the repurchase of up to one million shares of its outstanding common stock, noting that the market value of the shares "does not fairly reflect the company's market position or long-term prospects."
Adtran shares closed Tuesday off 2 at 23.
The company designs, develops and markets high-speed digital transmission products.
